title: API Academy: Learn How to Learn About APIs
description: To unlock the storage chest and obtain your wand, you must learn how to learn about APIs. This is achieved through documentation.

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: Visit the documentation for the [Twilio Programmable SMS API](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms). In the left hand menu, look for a heading called *API Reference*. Under this heading there are three subheadings, one for each `Resource` object. List one of the types of `Resource` objects.

validation_fields.name: answer2
validation_fields.label: Look at the documentation for the `Message Resource`. Type the first property listed for the `Message Resource`?
